metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Kartoffelsalat (Pota to Salad) • Ingredients : o 4 potatoes o 1 small onion o 1/4 cup bacon o 1/4 cup vinegar o 1/4 cup chicken broth o 1 tablespoon mustard o 1 teaspoon sugar o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper

Gyeran Jjim • Ingredients : o 4 eggs o 1 cup water o 1/4 cup green onions o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon sesame oil • Instructions : o Beat eggs with water, salt, and chopped green onions. o Pour mixture into a he atproof bowl. o Steam for 10 -15 minutes until set.
o Drizzle with sesame oil and serve warm. Harira • Ingredients :

Cottage Cheese and Veggie Bowl Ingredients: • 1 cup cottage cheese • 1/4 cup diced cucumber • 1/4 cup cherry tomatoes, halved • 1/4 cup diced bell pepper • Salt and pepper to taste Instructions: • In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, cucumber, cherry tomatoes, and bell pepper. • Season with salt and pepper.

Carrot Salad • Ingredients : o 4 carrots o 1/4 cup raisins o 1/4 cup parsley o 1/4 cup lemon juice o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon salt • Instructions : o Grate carrots and mix with raisins and chopped parsley. o Whisk lemon juice, olive oil, cum in, and salt, then pour over salad.

o Add salt to taste and serve. Albondig as • Ingredients : o 1/2 pound ground beef o 1/2 pound ground pork o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs o 1 egg o 1 teaspoon paprika o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/2 teaspoon pepper o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 cup tomato sauce • Instructions : o Mix ground beef, ground pork, diced onion, minced garlic, breadcrumbs, beaten
